notes: 04 February 2020. In Beerhani (Kismaayo Lower Juba) Jubaland security forces clashed with Al Shabaab militants during their military operation. Al Shabaab withdrew from the village.
04 February 2020. Unknown armed people shot at two tax collectors in Bossaso district (Bari). One was killed. Motive unknown.
04 February 2020. In Fiidow (Jowhar Middle Shabelle) Al Shabaab militants intercepted two trucks transporting corn and sorghum and stole two AK47 weapons and a sum of $ 1000 from the occupants.
04 February 2020. In Mogadishu-Yaqshid (Yaqshid Banadir) an armed group hurled a hand grenade against Somali military soldiers and the soldiers reacted with gunfire. No fatalities were recorded.

03 February 2020. In Mogadishu-Wadajir (Wadajir Banadir) after soldiers of the Somali military attempted to help a prisoner escape from a police station a clash occurred with the police forces. No fatalities were recorded.
03 February 2020. In Hareeri Jiif (coded to geoprecision 2Baidoa Baydhaba Bay) Al Shabaab militants beheaded a motorcycle driver for transporting a banned good in their area.

actor2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
notes: 03 February 2020. In Buurane (Jowhar Middle Shabelle) twin RCIEDs exploded targeting AMISOM convoy. Al Shabaab militants claimed responsibility. No fatalities were recorded.

03 February 2020. In Hadweyne (coded to geoprecision 2 to Dalsan Kismaayo Lower Juba) clashes between the Majeerteen and Owramale clan militia over land killed eleven clan members from Owramale and 7 from Majeerteen.
03 February 2020. In Diinsoor (Diinsoor Bay) a RCIED targeting soldiers of the Somali military exploded in an animal market. Civilians were injured.

03 February 2020. In Lafoole (Afgooye Lower Shabelle) an unknown armed group used explosive devices to target a Somali military vehicle but it instead hit a civilian vehicle killing the people in the car. Unknown fatalities coded as 3.
03 February 2020. In Mogadishu-Heliwa (Heliwa Banadir) unknown armed people hurled a hand grenade at Somali military soldiers. There were injuries reported.
03 February 2020. In Xaaji-Cali (Cadale Middle Shabelle) Al Shabaab militants who were on a shooting exercise shot and injured two women while practicing.

actor1: Military Forces of Somalia (2017-) Jubaland Security Force
notes: 03 February 2020. In Berhani (Jilib Middle Juba) Jubaland security forces killed an Al Shabaab militant.
03 February 2020. A landmine explosion by an unknown group killed four civilians between Afmadow and Dhobley town.
03 February 2020. A suspected remote-controlled explosion between Mogadishu (Mogadishu city Banadir) and Agooye killed four people. Attackers are unknown.
02 February 2020. Al Shabaab militants abducted three aid workers from Belet Xaawo (Belet Xaawo Gedo). Two of the abductees were female doctors.
02 February 2020. In Embareeso (Baraawe Lower Shabelle) Al Shabaab militants attacked Somali military forces. No fatalities were reported.
02 February 2020. In Jilib (Jilib Middle Juba) at least one Al Shabaab militant was killed in an airstrike by the airstrike of the US military forces.

actor2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
notes: 02 February 2020. In Qalimow (Qalimow Balcad Middle Shabelle) Al Shabaab militants attacked AMISOM forces using 82mm mortars. Fatalities were unreported.

actor2: Military Forces of Somalia (2017-) Puntland Maritime Police Force
notes: 02 February 2020. In Armo (Bossaso Bari) unknown clan militias ambushed and hijacked two Puntland maritime police battle wagons. No fatalities were reported.
02 February 2020. In Dalsan (Kismaayo Lower Juba) another round of clan clashes between the Majeerteen and Owramale clan militia occurred over a disputed land. Four Owramale clan members were killed.
02 February 2020. In Garsoor (Gaalkacyo Mudug) a municipality soldier was shot and wounded by an unidentified armed man. Motive unknown.
01 February 2020. In Golweyn (Marka Lower Shabelle) Al Shabaab militants clashed with Somali military forces. Fatalities unrecorded.
01 February 2020. In Mogadishu-Bondhere (Bondhere Banadir) gunmen travelling on a motorbike shot dead a soldier of the Somali military.

01 February 2020. In Mogadishu-Dalsan (Dharkenley Banadir) a roadside bomb by Al Shabaab militants wounded the Deputy District Commissioner of Kaxada Abdinasir Hassan Ali and killed two bodyguards in Dharkenlay.

actor2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
notes: 01 February 2020. In Mogadishu (Mogadishu City Banadir) Al Shabaab militants targeted AMISOM forces using bombs. No fatalities were recorded.
01 February 2020. In Mogadishu-Hodan (Hodan Banadir) armed people hurled a hand grenade against a military base. The military reacted with gunfire. Bystanders were injured.

actor2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
notes: 01 February 2020. In Sokolwa (Balcad Middle Shabelle) Al Shabaab militants targeted AMISOM forces using explosives. No fatalities reported.
01 February 2020. In Afgooye (Afgooye Lower Shabelle) Al Shabaab militants clashed with Somali military forces. Fatalities unreported.
01 February 2020. In Ceel Boon (Luuq Gedo) Al Shabaab militants abducted three civilians for allegedly receiving ration cards.
01 February 2020. In Mogadishu-Heliwa (Heliwa Banadir) suspected Al Shabaab militants shot and killed a Somali police officer.
01 February 2020. In Badhan (Laasqoray Sanaag) two unknown armed groups clashed. No fatalities were reported.
01 February 2020. In Kaayow (coded to geoprecision 2Baidoa Baydhaba Bay) Al Shabaab militants destroyed civilian property.

01 February 2020. In Dalsan (Kismaayo Lower Juba) clan clashes between the Majeerteen and Owramale clan militia occurred over a disputed land. Five clan members from Majeerteen and four from Owramale clan were killed.
